title: Ticket #87: Update Fedora cross tests to newer version
description: We have newer Fedora platforms in NMI we should test against. Consider taking down older Fedora cross tests.
remarks:
2009-Jan-24 21:46:16 by matt:
Fedora releases historically have a 13 month life, right now the current Fedora is F10 and F8 was recently end-of-life'd

The 64 bit 8 and 9 are all we have. They have been added as cross tests for both rhap_5 and 64_rhap_5.

bt
creator: bt
